players.name: Bob
memory: Diana: "I investigated Bob last night and confirmed he is the mafioso. We should vote him out to protect the town."
Charlie: "I believe Diana and think we should vote for Bob to protect the town."
Charlie: "I still support Diana's claim and think we should vote for Bob to eliminate the threat."
